title: Which disorder correctly pair with classification

content.question: Which of the following psychological disorders is correctly paired with the appropriate classification?

choices.label: posttraumatic stress . . trauma- and stressorrelated disorders

content.answer: posttraumatic stress . . trauma- and stressorrelated disorders

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
